title: Is there a difference between not speaking the truth and telling a lie? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you speaking of a lie of commission or a lie of omission? There're both lies in general. simple example: not telling someone they're cheating on them. I see no difference. Can see many situations not as obvious, but at its core is really lie. And that's the truth; or not.

Yes, dear lad.Do you consider silence to be the same as a lie? However, when reflecting on oneself, the difference narrows very much and guilt fills the voids. Silence has its moments though.'You have the right to be silent.' -_-
